cause.description:
We are a cause devoted to Al Gore's vision of Manbearpig. Jioning this cause will help the promotion of Manbearpig becoming El Presidente. Please Help Us!
1. Manbearpig must be President
2. Manbearpig is real (I'm serial)
3. Manbearpig lives in The Cave of Winds
cause.mission: get Manbearpig into the presidential office
cause.name: Vote Manbearpig!
